column1: #text=A nursery is a place where they have , flowers , plants , shrubs and trees .
#text=I chose a sapling - a young tree - paid for it and put in in the back of my pickup truck .
#text=When I got home I got a shovel out of my shed and dug a hole where I wanted to tree to grow , making sure it was n't too near my house .
#text=I dug the hole about two feet deep , a little bigger than the root ball on the bottom of my tree .
#text=Once I had the hole dug , I dropped the tree in , making sure the trunk was straight .
#text=I cut the burlap surrounding the root ball , and then filled in the space around the tree with the dirt I had dug out earlier .
#text=Finally , I grabbed a garden hose and watered the tree , making sure to give it a good soaking .
#text=The tree should give us pleasure for years to come .
